title: The booke of faulconrie or hauking for the onely delight and pleasure of all noblemen and gentlemen: collected out of the best aucthors, asvvell Italians as Frenchmen, and some English practises withall concernyng faulconrie, the contentes whereof are to be seene in the next page folowyng. By George Turberuile Gentleman.
author: Turberville, George, 1540?-1610?
publicationStmtPublisher: [By Henry Bynneman] for Christopher Barker, at the signe of the Grashopper in Paules Churchyarde,
